mapper.select: select l.id id, l.status_ status, l.arriving_time arriving_time, leaving_time, l.risk_level, t.name station_name, t.address station_address, r1.address recipient_address, r2.address addressor_address, r2.name addressor, r1.name recipient, r1.city recipient_city, r2.city addressor_city, l.risk_block, o.id order_id from logistics l, order_ o, transfer_station t, related_person r1, related_person r2 where l.order_id = o.id and l.submiter = #{userId} and l.station_id = t.id and o.recipient_id = r1.id and o.addressor_id = r2.id order by l.arriving_time desc;

select l.id id, l.status_ status, l.arriving_time arriving_time, l.risk_level, t.name station_name, t.address station_address, r1.name recipient, r1.address recipient_address, r1.longitude recipient_longitude, r1.latitude recipient_latitude, r2.address addressor_address, r2.name addressor, r2.longitude addressor_longitude, r2.latitude addressor_latitude, r1.city recipient_city, r2.city addressor_city, l.risk_block, o.id order_id from logistics l, order_ o, transfer_station t, related_person r1, related_person r2 where l.order_id = o.id and o.id = #{orderId} and l.station_id = t.id and o.recipient_id = r1.id and o.addressor_id = r2.id and l.status_ = 1;

select l.status_ status, l.arriving_time arriving_time, l.leaving_time leaving_time, t.name station_name, u.username worker_name, t.risk risk, t.longitude longitude, t.latitude latitude, l.risk_block risk_block, t.transportation_type station_type from logistics l, order_ o, transfer_station t, user u where l.order_id = o.id and l.station_id = t.id and l.submiter = u.id and o.id = #{orderId} order by l.arriving_time desc;
mapper.insert: insert into order_(order_time, arriving_time, addressor_id, recipient_id, commodity) value (#{orderTime}, #{arrivingTime}, #{addressorId}, #{recipientId}, #{commodity});

insert into logistics(station_id, arriving_time, leaving_time, risk_level, submiter, status_, order_id) value (#{stationId}, #{arrivingTime}, #{leavingTime}, #{riskLevel}, #{submiter}, #{status}, #{orderId});
mapper.select: select * from logistics where order_id = #{orderId} order by arriving_time desc;
mapper.update: update logistics set leaving_time = #{leavingTime}, status_ = #{status} where id = #{id};
